detectors.description: VendingMachine.vendWater(address,address) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe70862854d3e8bcdec8cfaf417cc24dfed27b611-VendingMachine.sol#1296-1314) uses a weak PRNG: randNum != 69 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe70862854d3e8bcdec8cfaf417cc24dfed27b611-VendingMachine.sol#1301)

VendingMachine.randomInt() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe70862854d3e8bcdec8cfaf417cc24dfed27b611-VendingMachine.sol#1370-1374) uses a weak PRNG: random (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe70862854d3e8bcdec8cfaf417cc24dfed27b611-VendingMachine.sol#1373)

VendingMachine.bangOnGlass() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe70862854d3e8bcdec8cfaf417cc24dfed27b611-VendingMachine.sol#1316-1325) uses a weak PRNG: randInt != 69 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe70862854d3e8bcdec8cfaf417cc24dfed27b611-VendingMachine.sol#1319)

VendingMachine.randomInt() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe70862854d3e8bcdec8cfaf417cc24dfed27b611-VendingMachine.sol#1370-1374) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: random = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encode(block.timestamp,msg.sender,nonce))) % stickChance (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xe70862854d3e8bcdec8cfaf417cc24dfed27b611-VendingMachine.sol#1371)
